headline: Assessing CenterPoint Energy (CNP) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Mixed Fair Value Signals
summary: CenterPoint Energy (CNP) is back on investor radars after its shares closed at $39.83, with recent returns over the month and past 3 months prompting fresh interest in this regulated utility. See our latest analysis for CenterPoint Energy. The recent 4.0% 30 day share price return, on top of a 26.2% 1 year total shareholder return, suggests momentum has been building as investors reassess CenterPoint Energy’s mix of electric and natural gas operations and its risk profile.
